properties.sfomuseum:description: Airmail flight cover, part of International Tributes to the History of Flight series by the Postal Commemorative Society; white envelope with full color illustration cachet and inset stamp commemorating first/inaugural crossing of the English Channel on January 7, 1785, in Dover, England, by Jean-Pierre Blanchard and John Jeffries with hydrogen balloon; cancellation stamp dated January 7, 1985 in Dover; includes information on reverse.
properties.wof:name: airmail flight cover: First crossing of the English Channel commemorative
